name: Mario
description: The iconic plumber hero of the Super Mario series, known for his jumping abilities and bravery.

name: Luigi
description: Mario's taller, slightly younger brother, often distinguished by his green outfit.

name: Link
description: The courageous hero of The Legend of Zelda series, known for wielding the Master Sword.
games: Zelda II: The Adventure of Link

name: Samus Aran
description: The protagonist of the Metroid series, a bounty hunter in a powerful Power Suit.

name: Mega Man
description: A robot with a Mega Buster arm cannon, fighting to stop Dr. Wily's plans.

name: Simon Belmont
description: A vampire hunter wielding the whip Vampire Killer, fighting Dracula.

name: Donkey Kong
description: A powerful ape originally antagonistic in Donkey Kong but later a hero in other games.

name: Pit
description: The angelic protagonist of Kid Icarus, tasked with saving Angel Land.

name: Ryu Hayabusa
description: A ninja on a quest for revenge and to recover stolen artifacts.
games: Ninja Gaiden II: The Dark Sword of Chaos
Ninja Gaiden III: The Ancient Ship of Doom

name: Kirby
description: A small, pink, spherical character with the ability to inhale enemies and gain their abilities.
